questions_and_answers.q: What fraction of 3 yards is 3 inches?
What is the remainder when 5462 is divided by 9?
Twenty-five percent of n is 12.  What is 300% of n?
Express the ratio of 2^3 to 3^3, as a common fraction.
What is the remainder when the sum of 16 + 84 + 13 + 87 + 13 + 88 is divided by 5?
What is the sum of the reciprocals of the first 3 positive even integers?
What is the maximum number of quarters you could receive in exchange for $5.90?
What is the greatest integer, n, such that 3^n < 1,000?
What is the value of (8!/6! – 2)?
What is the tens digit of 5^27?
What is the mean of the first ten positive odd integers?
What is the thirteenth term of the arithmetic sequence -3, -1, 1, ...?
How many three-digit even numbers are greater than 800?
The product of two integers is 24.  The sum of the two integers is -14.  What is the larger of the two integers?
What is the sum of the number of faces and vertices of a pentagonal prism?
How many perfect cubes are between 100 and 500?
What is the sum of the x-coordinate and y-coordinate of the point of intersection of y = x and x = 5?
Solve for x: 10^x = 1000^2.
If 2a + 3b = 30 and 3a + 2b = 70, what is the value of a + b?
The first four terms of a sequence are -1, 1, 0, and 1, respectively.  Each subsequent term is the sum of the previous four terms.  What is the sixth term of the sequence?
By what percent must the radius of a circle decrease in order to decrease the area of a circle by 75%?
In the equation 7 + x + y = 19, x and y are positive one-digit whole numbers.  What is the least value possible for x?
How many even positive integers are between -5(pi) and +5(pi)?
If 2ab = 6, evaluate 32a^2b^2.
How many square units are in the area of the largest square that can be inscribed in a circle with radius 1 unit?
Point A is mirrored about the line y = x to create Point B.  If Point A is (-4, 3), what is the sum of the coordinates for Point B?
For how many different digits, 1 through 9, is the two-digit number “6n” divisible by n?
If a square has an area of 20 square inches, what is the perimeter of the square in inches?  Express your answer in simplest radical form.
What is the smallest possible quotient of any two distinct members of the set {½, ¼, 8, 10}?  Express your answer as a common fraction.
Simplify: (¼)^-2
A patient takes one pill every 8 hours until the whole bottle of 30 pills is gone.  How many hours elapsed between the time the first pill was taken and the time the last pill was taken?
What value of x satisfies (4^x) (10^x) = (14^x) ?
A sign painter paints individual numbers for a row of 100 houses. The houses are numbered with consecutive integers 1 to 100.  How many 9’s are painted?
Jackie can bike at a rate of 10 miles per hour.  If she continues at this rate, how many minutes will it take her to travel 40 miles?
What is the hundreds digit in the following product: (5) (6) (7) (8) (9) (10)?
How many cubic inches are in ½ of a cubic foot?
Evaluate: 5^5 ÷ 25.
If 20% of 10% of a number is 12, what is 40% of 20% of the same number?
What is the greatest three-digit integer in which the product of the digits is 0?
